title: The Trouble with Wives, Christians, Randos and Fancy Vervaeke Words
description:
Job, Jeff and Luke were some of my earliest listeners who reached out to me for conversation. You can many of their talks on my channel. About a year ago I limited the repetition of talks to 2. When I did that these guys started their own YouTube Channel "Randos United". Job also has become "the pastor of the discord server" where he conducts similar conversations with those who watch the channel. We got together for a 2 hour chat which will likely get us all in trouble. 

Previous conversation with the 4 of us https://youtu.be/mHBVLEthbgk
